contents.text: Welcome to Thoughtworks San Francisco, where we revolutionize software creation and delivery while advocating for positive social change.
For inquiries about new software solutions and consulting, press 1.
To discuss a new project with our development team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a project specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a project specialist to kick off a new software development initiative.
I want to discuss building a mobile app to help veterans access their benefits.
I need to discuss designing a scalable microservices application with a development specialist.
I want to discuss building a custom app to help me manage my medication schedule.
Discuss building a custom lab data logging app for my research.

contents.text: To learn about our agile coaching and digital transformation services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an agile coaching consultant.

navigationGoals: I want an overview of your agile coaching and digital transformation offerings.
I need advice on adopting agile practices for my veteran-focused nonprofit’s website redesign.
I’d like to explore your agile coaching methodology and continuous delivery pipeline guidance.
I’d like to learn about agile coaching services to modernize my small community center’s operations.
Learn how agile practices could streamline my physics research workflow.

contents.text: If you are an existing client seeking support or account assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need assistance from tech support to resolve an urgent issue with our system.
I'm having a technical issue with the veteran support portal you built and need help resolving it.
I need assistance troubleshooting a CI/CD pipeline failure on our staging environment.
I need technical support because I can’t access my Thoughtworks client portal.
Get technical help troubleshooting the API integration on my project dashboard.

contents.text: To speak with your account manager, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your account manager.

navigationGoals: Put me through to my account manager for a status update on our engagement.
I'd like to discuss renewing our service agreement and review billing details for our existing project.
I’d like to discuss contract renewal and pricing tiers with my account manager.
I want to speak with my account manager about updating my service plan and billing.
Talk to my account manager about extending our student consulting package.
